snippet: The pointlessly bejeweled paintings and histrionic sculptures of the artist Raqib Shaw are now hyperventilating in all three of the Pace Gallery’s spaces on West 25th Street.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit of paintings and sculptures by artist Raqib Shaw at Pace Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The pointlessly bejeweled paintings and histrionic sculptures of the artist Raqib Shaw are now hyperventilating in all three of the Pace Gallery’s spaces on West 25th Street.
